title: Immediate Hiring - Sr. SAP ABAP at Mumbai location
jobDescription:
About the Company:

Castaliaz Technologies Private Limited is an SAP GOLD Partner company. We are looking for a highly skilled and experienced Senior SAP ABAP Consultant to join our dynamic team.


Job Description:

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and implement SAP ABAP solutions to meet business requirements.
  • Work closely with functional consultants to understand business needs and translate them into technical specifications.
  • Perform code reviews and ensure adherence to best practices and coding standards.
  • Develop and maintain custom reports, interfaces, conversions, enhancements, forms, and workflows (RICEF).
  • Optimize and enhance existing ABAP programs to improve performance and functionality.
  • Debug and troubleshoot issues in the SAP system and provide effective solutions.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of ABAP developments with other SAP modules.
  • Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior ABAP developers.
  • Participate in project planning, including defining the technical scope and estimating effort.
  • Prepare technical documentation, including specifications, test scripts, and user manuals.
  • Ensure compliance with SAP security and governance standards.
  • Stay updated with the latest SAP technologies and best practices.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • Minimum of 5 years of experience in SAP ABAP development.
  • Proficient in ABAP programming, including reports, forms (AdobeForms, SmartForms, SAPscript), module pool programming, BAPIs, BADIs, user exits, and enhancement points.
  • Strong understanding of SAP modules (e.g., MM, SD, FI, CO, PM, WM, PP) and their integration points.
  • Experience with SAP S/4HANA, ODATA, and Fiori development is a plus.
  • Knowledge of ABAP Objects (OOP) and modern ABAP programming techniques.
  • Familiarity with SAP enhancement frameworks such as user exits, BAdIs, and enhancement spots.
  • Strong debugging and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience with SAP HANA and CDS views.
  • Experience with ODATA.
  • Knowledge of SAP UI5 and Fiori development.
  • Experience with SAP Workflow and Process Integration (PI/PO).
  • Understanding of Agile development methodologies.
  • Knowledge of SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP) is highly preferred.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
tagsAndSkills: QA/Process Improvement Engineer,ASME,ASTM,QESH Engineer,API,NDT Techniques,QA Engineer Pumps,NDT
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities

  • Making Quality Assurance Plan, Pump test procedures, NDT procedures, WPS PQR, other test procedures for pumps & submission to respective customers for pre & post order activities.
  • Properly documenting the inspection activities in stage & final witness or pumps .
  • Working closely with operatons to make QA awareness & culture in Services India.
  • In-coming inspection of castings, machined parts, fabricated parts, & Bought outs.
  • Document review of castings, machined parts, fabricated parts, base plates, seal systems, motors, coupling etc.
  • ASNT experience is required, NDT (LP, MP, UT, RT).
  • Coordination with at source inspectors/ TPI agencies.
  • Final inspection of parts, Pumps and Packages.
  • Deviation request review and approval and communicate with vendors.
  • NCR generation and data review and coordination with concern departments.
  • Material Record Book (MRB) preparation as per approved ITP.
  • Resolve the comments raised on MRB by customers/ TPI.
  • Customer complaint review and analysis.
  • MIS data consolidation and updating and maintaining the same.
  • ISO 9001, 14001, 45001 awareness & IMS documentation.

  • QM Lot/ GRN clearance.
  • To achieve COPQ below 1% of COGS.
  • To achieve Warranty cost below 0.75% of sales.
  • Safety observation & engagement.

Desired experience and qualifications

  • Bachelors Degree / Diploma in Mechanical Engineering with minimum 5+ years’ experience in a similar position.
  • Good reading knowledge of ENGG Drawing GD&T. Knowledge and technical understanding of Pump processes, components, manufacturing, and testing techniques.
  • Broad technical insight in other areas like ASTM, API, ASME.
  • Minimum Level 2 qualified in NDT techniques – Die Penetrant, Magnetic particle, Ultrasonic.
  • Hands-on experience in MS Office tools. Good communication skills in English – Verbal and Written
  • Able to perform under demanding scenarios, Flexibility and ability to adapt to change.
  • Good interpersonal skills as this role involves extensive communication with internal and external stakeholders.
  • Relationship Management - Works collaboratively with cross functional stakeholders at all levels.
  • QA module (SAP/ ERP)
  • Basic Knowledge of 7 QC tools.
  • Data analysis.
  • QESH experience will be preferable.

title: Senior Associate - Syndicated Loan Servicing (Mumbai Airoli)
tagsAndSkills: Syndicated Loan Servicing,Debts instruments,Reconciliation,Loan Operations,Debt,Loan syndication,Loan Servicing,Operations
jobDescription:
Syndicated Loan Servicing Job Description

  • Processing loans on Advent Geneva and full loan maintenance, including funding, paydowns, borrows, rollovers etc
  • Processing of Drawdown, Rollovers, Rate Set, Paydown, Conversions, Splits, Combines, PIK etc and all other events pertaining to Syndicated Loans life cycle
  • Monitor and record all incoming cash flows and position reconciliation of the loans held in client portfolio. Preparation and allocation of upcoming events data on daily basis, handling exceptions
  • Significant Interaction with SS&C GlobeOp’s clients, agent banks and other internal departments (i.e.: fund accounting, operations, OTC operations and OTC Pricing) relative to loan processing
  • Providing daily operational support to SS&C GlobeOp’s clients engaged in a variety of investment products but with a focus on the trading of primary and secondary bank loans, total return swaps and CLO's
  • Analyze and understand all security & cash position differences related to reconciliations and coordinate break resolution process with Client, Prime brokers, Counterparty and internal departments
  • Exercises wide-latitude to make decisions within established company policies to meet business objectives. Advises staff and partners with cross-functional teams to meet project schedules and to develop solutions to issues. Accountable for department results. Establishes procedures and recommends changes to policies.

title: SAP PP Consultant
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities


  • SAP Functional Consultant with 2 plus years of relevant experience in PP.
  • Implementation/Rollout & Support experience for SAP PP module including PP Customization & Development activities.
  • Exhibit good understanding on SAP PP Master data management like BOM,Routing,WC,
    Production versions, Mass upload etc.
  • Expert knowledge in PP Customizing configuration, MRP, Demand Planning, Shop Floor
    execution processes, batch management across different industries (discrete, REM, process)
  • Must have strong experience working as functional consultant in development of custom
    programs, enhancements and own the delivery to Business along with the Technical
    (ABAP) Team
  • Expertise in SAP PP Functional Testing (Regression & Non-Regression Testing) for
    Rollout/Upgrades
  • Good Integration knowledge with other SAP other Modules like MM,WM,SD,QM,FI/CO
  • Good Knowledge on Interface integrations, data upload/extraction tools etc.
  • Must have good communication skills
  • Must be dynamic, flexible and possess perseverance skills

  • If your are Interested Please Share CV on nmscareer2@gmail.com
